Offer: 7.5% Instant Discount up to INR 1500 Instant Discount on IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Card EMI Trxn. Minimum purchase value INR 10000
Terms and Conditions:
Promotion Terms
FAQs

1.What is the offer?

Get 7.5% instant bank discount on IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Card EMI on purchase of select products from 1st November to 20th November 2025. Please check Product Page to confirm the offer eligibility.

2.How can I avail this offer?

Just go through the normal purchase shopping process. On the payment page, please select your saved IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Card and check whether the transaction is eligible for EMI or not. If yes, please select the desired tenure and proceed. Check product page first to confirm if product is eligible for the instant bank discount on EMI.

3.What is the minimum transaction size for the instant discount?

The minimum transaction amount to avail discount is Rs. 10,000.

4.What is the maximum discount that I can avail?

The maximum discount per card across Amazon.in Site and App is Rs. 4,000. Please refer table.

Additional Flat Rs 500 Instant Discount on Credit Card EMI on transaction worth Rs 24,990

Additional Flat Rs 500 Instant Discount on Credit Card EMI on transaction worth Rs 24,990 on 9Months and above tenures

Additional Flat Rs 1000 Instant Discount on Credit Card EMI on transaction worth Rs 49,990

Additional Flat Rs 500 Instant Discount on Credit Card EMI on transaction worth Rs 49,990 on 9Months and above tenures

*TV, Consumer Electronics, Media, Home Kitchen, Fashion, Toys and Furniture

5.What if I cancel/return the product?

Offer is not applicable if the order is cancelled, or product is returned.

6.Can I avail discount on card payment for cash on delivery order? Are net Banking transactions also included in this Offer?

Net Banking and Card Payment on COD transactions are NOT included in this Offer.

7. Would I get the Discount offer even if I make a part payment using my Amazon Pay Balance?

No, instant bank discount is not applicable if part payment is made using Amazon Pay Balance.

8.Can I get this offer even with Exchange?

Yes, you can avail this offer even if the transaction involves exchange of an old product but the transaction value after exchange should be greater than Rs. 10,000.

9.My payment failed while placing the order, will I be eligible for the discount?

If your payment failed while placing the order, Amazon.in gives you an option to revise your payment. If you revise your payment within the offer duration, you will be eligible for the cashback. For more information on revise payment, click here

Schedule 1

Offer Terms and Conditions

This "Offer" is provided to you by IDFC First bank Limited("Bank") and Amazon Pay (India) Private Limited (formerly known as Amazon Online Distribution Services Private Limited) ("Amazon") and made available on the website www.amazon.in and the mobile site and mobile application thereof (collectively, "Amazon.in").
These Offer terms and conditions ("Offer Terms") are in addition to the Amazon.in Conditions of Use & Sale and Privacy Notice to which you agree to by using Amazon.in and Terms & Conditions of IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Cards. In the event of any conflict between the Conditions of Use & Sale and these Offer Terms, these Offer Terms will prevail, only for the purposes of this Offer.
All residents of India holding IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Card issued by the Bank (each a "Card") are eligible to avail the Offer (each a "Cardholder").
The Offer is valid from 1st November to 20th November 2025 (collectively "Offer Period"), unless revoked or extended by Amazon (in its sole discretion), without any prior notice and without any liability.
Under this Offer, any Cardholder who, during the Offer Period, makes a transaction of INR 10,000 or above using his/her IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Card ("Card"), on www.amazon.in or the mobile application/mobile site thereof (collectively, "Amazon.in"), irrespective of the number of transactions (?Offer?), and by availing the equated monthly installments (Instant EMI) facility (provided on the Card by the Bank), will be entitled to receive 7.5% instant discount of the list price of the Product (as determined by the relevant seller). Cardholders need to check the offer eligibility on the Product Page.

The Offer is NOT applicable on payment made by customers using the 'Card on Delivery' payment option.
The purchase of Product by Cardholders on equated monthly instalments (Instant EMI).
This Offer will also be applicable on purchase of Products by Cardholders under an exchange offer (if available on the Product(s). For the avoidance of doubt, it is hereby clarified that the discount amount of up to INR 4,000 on Credit Card will be provided to Cardholders under this Offer on the net value paid on such transaction i.e., the price paid by Cardholders after the exchange offer has been availed, provided such value should be a minimum of INR 10,000.
This Offer can be availed / clubbed with a no-cost equated monthly installment (EMI) promotion, if any, on the Product. In other words, if no-cost EMI / interest refund promotion is being availed by the Cardholder on the Product, then the Cardholder will also be eligible for this Offer.
Bank will continue to charge interest as applicable. However, in no-cost EMI this interest charge has been provided as an upfront discount by Amazon to the Card at the time of your purchase, effectively resulting in a benefit of a 100% interest refund offer by Amazon. Applicable GST on interest charged by IDFC FIRST Bank must be borne by Cardholder in case of 100% interest refund offer provided by brands/merchants on select products.
In case there are multiple items in a purchase order, the item-wise savings/discount may vary. However, the overall savings/discount on the purchase order will be equivalent to maximum savings/discount the Cardholder is eligible for under this Offer.
This Offer will not be applicable if the Cardholder or the seller or Amazon cancel the order and/or the Cardholder returns the Product and, in such a case, participation in the Offer will be deemed withdrawn. In such a scenario, only the net amount paid by the Cardholder will be refunded.
Bank and/or Amazon do not endorse any of the products or brands being offered on Amazon.in and will not accept any liability pertaining to the quality, merchantability, fitness, delivery or after sales service of such products.
The Bank reserves the right to disqualify Cardholders from the benefits of the Offer if any fraudulent activity is identified as being carried out for the purpose of availing the benefits under the said Offer or otherwise by use of the Card.
Amazon reserves the right, at any time, without prior notice and without assigning any reason whatsoever, to add/alter/modify/change or vary any or all of these Offer Terms or to replace, wholly or in part, this Offer by another offer, whether similar to this Offer or not.
Delinquent and over-limit Bank's credit card members will not qualify for this Offer.
Cardholders are not bound in any way to participate in this Offer. Any such participation is purely voluntary. The Offer is being made purely on a best effort basis.
Nothing herein amounts to a commitment by the Bank or Amazon to conduct further, similar or other offers.
The above Offer is by way of a special offer and nothing contained herein shall prejudice or affect the terms and conditions of the card member agreement. The terms of the above schemes shall be in addition to and not in derogation of the terms contained in the card member agreement.
All disputes between Cardholders and Bank will be resolved inter se, and Amazon will not (nor will be liable or obliged to) mediate or resolve any dispute or disagreement between Cardholders and Bank.
This Offer is not valid on corporate, commercial Cards issued by the Bank.
This Offer is not applicable on Debit card transactions.
This Offer is not available on: (i) purchase of product(s) other than the Product(s), or (ii) purchase of Product using an instrument other than the one mentioned in point 5.
Under no circumstance will benefit being offered under this Offer be settled with cash in lieu by Bank or by Amazon.
By participating in this Offer, every Cardholder expressly agrees that Amazon or any of its affiliates will not be liable or responsible for any loss or damage whatsoever that a Cardholder may suffer, directly or indirectly, in connection with this Offer including but not limited to that associated with his/ her use or delivery or misuse of the Product.
These Offer Terms are governed by the laws of India and the courts at Mumbai will have exclusive jurisdiction over any disputes in relation to these Offer Terms.
Any person availing this Offer will be deemed to have accepted these Offer Terms.
Notwithstanding anything contained in these Offer Terms, this Offer is not applicable on the purchase of the following products:
Gift Card(s) (Amazon branded and Non Amazon branded)
Prepaid phone recharges, DTH recharges, Bill Payments
Kindle e-books and Kindle Unlimited Subscription Program
Amazon Pay balance loading
Amazon Prime subscription
Infant Nutrition products
Select phones (see product page for offer eligibility)
Precious Jewelry including Gold/Silver Coins.
Grocery Products

Select eligible card at the time of checkout
No promo code required to avail the offer

1. What is the OneCard Credit Card Offer ("Offer")?

a) Offer on payment with OneCard Credit Card EMI

b) Minimum transaction amount excluding ineligible products, refunds and exchange discounts is INR 10,000 for Credit Card EMI transactions.

c) Offer and Maximum Savings as below:

d) The minimum Transaction value needs to be met at a cart level for the customer to be eligible for the respective discount.

e) The Maximum discount of INR 3500 per card during Offer Period. The max discount per card will not exceed INR 3500.

f) Any cancelled order(s) will not be eligible for the offer and the refund amount of such order will be adjusted against the instant discount amount.

2. What is the minimum transaction size for the discount for the duration of the event?

The minimum transaction amount to avail the Instant Discount is INR 10,000 for Credit Card EMI in a single transaction on Amazon.in, net of buybacks, refunds and cancellations.

3. What if I cancel my order?

The Offer is applicable for a successful transaction. If Instant Discount is availed on any purchase, and the transaction is subsequently cancelled, the refund amount of such orders will be post adjusting the instant discount amount availed on the purchase.

4. Would I get the Discount offer even if I make a part payment using my Amazon Pay Balance?

No, instant bank discount is not applicable if part payment is made using Amazon Pay Balance.

5. Can I place multiple orders using OneCard Credit cards and still get the Instant discount?

Yes, you can avail instant discount on multiple orders till you exhaust the respective limits of the Cards. However, please note that each transaction must meet the respective minimum value for you to get the instant discount.

6. Is Discount under this Offer applicable on both Credit and Debit cards?

The discount is available only on Credit Card EMI. Offer is NOT valid on 1) Debit Cards and 2) Net banking and 3) Payment made by Cardholders using the 'Cash on Delivery' payment option.

8. Can I get this offer with No Cost EMI?

The offer is valid on No Cost EMI if the product is eligible for No Cost EMI.

9. I purchased an eligible item but still did not get Instant Discount. Why?

For purchases made using ?Card on delivery? transactions and Net Banking transactions, you will not get the benefit of the instant discount.

Net Banking transactions are NOT included in this Offer.

10. My Amazon.in order includes Amazon.in Gift Card(s); will I be eligible for an Instant Discount under this Offer? Is the Offer applicable on purchase of all products?

No, the discount under this Offer is not applicable on purchase of:

Gift Card(s) (Amazon branded and non-Amazon branded)
All types of Prepaid Recharges (Mobile, DTH, Google Play, Subscriptions, Cable TV, Metro and any other type of prepaid recharge
All types of Bills Payments
Digital Gold purchases and sales
Kindle e-books and Kindle Unlimited Subscription Program
Select Mobile, TV and Electronic products (see product page for offer eligibility)
Amazon Pay balance loading
Amazon Prime subscription

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

Get 10% instant discount on J&K Credit and Debit Card transactions in the months of October & November from 21st October ? 20th November 2025.

3. How can I avail this offer?

There are no other special steps to avail this offer. Just go through the normal purchase process and use your saved J&K Debit or Credit Card to pay

4. Can I get this offer with Exchange offer?

Yes, the offer is valid on exchange as long as minimum purchase value (after Exchange discount) is spent on Bank Card.

5. Can I avail discount on card payment for cash on delivery order? Are net Banking transactions also included in this Offer?

COD and Net Banking transactions are NOT included in this Offer.

No, this offer is not applicable on EMI payment.

The Offer is applicable for a successful purchase. If Instant Discount is availed on any purchase, and it is subsequently cancelled, the refund amount of such purchases will be posted adjusting the instant discount amount availed on the purchase. However, if you place another order within the offer period, you shall get instant bank discount subject to offer eligibility.

If your payment failed while placing the order, Amazon.in gives you an option to revise your payment. If you revise your payment within the offer duration, you will be eligible for the cashback. For more information on revise payment, click here

Get 7.5% instant bank discount on IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Card EMI on purchase of select products from 1st November to 20th November 2025. Please check Product Page to confirm the offer eligibility.

2.How can I avail this offer?

Just go through the normal purchase shopping process. On the payment page, please select your saved IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Card and check whether the transaction is eligible for EMI or not. If yes, please select the desired tenure and proceed. Check product page first to confirm if product is eligible for the instant bank discount on EMI.

3.What is the minimum transaction size for the instant discount?

The minimum transaction amount to avail discount is Rs. 10,000.

4.What is the maximum discount that I can avail?

The maximum discount per card across Amazon.in Site and App is Rs. 4,000. Please refer table.

Additional Flat Rs 1000 Instant Discount on Credit Card EMI on transaction worth Rs 49,990

Additional Flat Rs 500 Instant Discount on Credit Card EMI on transaction worth Rs 49,990 on 9Months and above tenures

*TV, Consumer Electronics, Media, Home Kitchen, Fashion, Toys and Furniture

5.What if I cancel/return the product?

Offer is not applicable if the order is cancelled, or product is returned.

6.Can I avail discount on card payment for cash on delivery order? Are net Banking transactions also included in this Offer?

Net Banking and Card Payment on COD transactions are NOT included in this Offer.

7. Would I get the Discount offer even if I make a part payment using my Amazon Pay Balance?

No, instant bank discount is not applicable if part payment is made using Amazon Pay Balance.

8.Can I get this offer even with Exchange?

Yes, you can avail this offer even if the transaction involves exchange of an old product but the transaction value after exchange should be greater than Rs. 10,000.

9.My payment failed while placing the order, will I be eligible for the discount?

If your payment failed while placing the order, Amazon.in gives you an option to revise your payment. If you revise your payment within the offer duration, you will be eligible for the cashback. For more information on revise payment, click here

Offer Terms and Conditions

This "Offer" is provided to you by IDFC First bank Limited("Bank") and Amazon Pay (India) Private Limited (formerly known as Amazon Online Distribution Services Private Limited) ("Amazon") and made available on the website www.amazon.in and the mobile site and mobile application thereof (collectively, "Amazon.in").
These Offer terms and conditions ("Offer Terms") are in addition to the Amazon.in Conditions of Use & Sale and Privacy Notice to which you agree to by using Amazon.in and Terms & Conditions of IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Cards. In the event of any conflict between the Conditions of Use & Sale and these Offer Terms, these Offer Terms will prevail, only for the purposes of this Offer.
All residents of India holding IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Card issued by the Bank (each a "Card") are eligible to avail the Offer (each a "Cardholder").
The Offer is valid from 1st November to 20th November 2025 (collectively "Offer Period"), unless revoked or extended by Amazon (in its sole discretion), without any prior notice and without any liability.
Under this Offer, any Cardholder who, during the Offer Period, makes a transaction of INR 10,000 or above using his/her IDFC FIRST Bank Credit Card ("Card"), on www.amazon.in or the mobile application/mobile site thereof (collectively, "Amazon.in"), irrespective of the number of transactions (?Offer?), and by availing the equated monthly installments (Instant EMI) facility (provided on the Card by the Bank), will be entitled to receive 7.5% instant discount of the list price of the Product (as determined by the relevant seller). Cardholders need to check the offer eligibility on the Product Page.

The purchase of Product by Cardholders on equated monthly instalments (Instant EMI).
This Offer will also be applicable on purchase of Products by Cardholders under an exchange offer (if available on the Product(s). For the avoidance of doubt, it is hereby clarified that the discount amount of up to INR 4,000 on Credit Card will be provided to Cardholders under this Offer on the net value paid on such transaction i.e., the price paid by Cardholders after the exchange offer has been availed, provided such value should be a minimum of INR 10,000.
This Offer can be availed / clubbed with a no-cost equated monthly installment (EMI) promotion, if any, on the Product. In other words, if no-cost EMI / interest refund promotion is being availed by the Cardholder on the Product, then the Cardholder will also be eligible for this Offer.
Bank will continue to charge interest as applicable. However, in no-cost EMI this interest charge has been provided as an upfront discount by Amazon to the Card at the time of your purchase, effectively resulting in a benefit of a 100% interest refund offer by Amazon. Applicable GST on interest charged by IDFC FIRST Bank must be borne by Cardholder in case of 100% interest refund offer provided by brands/merchants on select products.
In case there are multiple items in a purchase order, the item-wise savings/discount may vary. However, the overall savings/discount on the purchase order will be equivalent to maximum savings/discount the Cardholder is eligible for under this Offer.
This Offer will not be applicable if the Cardholder or the seller or Amazon cancel the order and/or the Cardholder returns the Product and, in such a case, participation in the Offer will be deemed withdrawn. In such a scenario, only the net amount paid by the Cardholder will be refunded.
Bank and/or Amazon do not endorse any of the products or brands being offered on Amazon.in and will not accept any liability pertaining to the quality, merchantability, fitness, delivery or after sales service of such products.
The Bank reserves the right to disqualify Cardholders from the benefits of the Offer if any fraudulent activity is identified as being carried out for the purpose of availing the benefits under the said Offer or otherwise by use of the Card.
Amazon reserves the right, at any time, without prior notice and without assigning any reason whatsoever, to add/alter/modify/change or vary any or all of these Offer Terms or to replace, wholly or in part, this Offer by another offer, whether similar to this Offer or not.
Delinquent and over-limit Bank's credit card members will not qualify for this Offer.
Cardholders are not bound in any way to participate in this Offer. Any such participation is purely voluntary. The Offer is being made purely on a best effort basis.
Nothing herein amounts to a commitment by the Bank or Amazon to conduct further, similar or other offers.
The above Offer is by way of a special offer and nothing contained herein shall prejudice or affect the terms and conditions of the card member agreement. The terms of the above schemes shall be in addition to and not in derogation of the terms contained in the card member agreement.
All disputes between Cardholders and Bank will be resolved inter se, and Amazon will not (nor will be liable or obliged to) mediate or resolve any dispute or disagreement between Cardholders and Bank.
This Offer is not valid on corporate, commercial Cards issued by the Bank.
This Offer is not applicable on Debit card transactions.
This Offer is not available on: (i) purchase of product(s) other than the Product(s), or (ii) purchase of Product using an instrument other than the one mentioned in point 5.
Under no circumstance will benefit being offered under this Offer be settled with cash in lieu by Bank or by Amazon.
By participating in this Offer, every Cardholder expressly agrees that Amazon or any of its affiliates will not be liable or responsible for any loss or damage whatsoever that a Cardholder may suffer, directly or indirectly, in connection with this Offer including but not limited to that associated with his/ her use or delivery or misuse of the Product.
These Offer Terms are governed by the laws of India and the courts at Mumbai will have exclusive jurisdiction over any disputes in relation to these Offer Terms.
Any person availing this Offer will be deemed to have accepted these Offer Terms.
Notwithstanding anything contained in these Offer Terms, this Offer is not applicable on the purchase of the following products:
Gift Card(s) (Amazon branded and Non Amazon branded)
Prepaid phone recharges, DTH recharges, Bill Payments
Kindle e-books and Kindle Unlimited Subscription Program
Amazon Pay balance loading
Amazon Prime subscription
Infant Nutrition products
Select phones (see product page for offer eligibility)
Precious Jewelry including Gold/Silver Coins.
Grocery Products

1. What is the OneCard Credit Card Offer ("Offer")?

a) Offer on payment with OneCard Credit Card EMI

b) Minimum transaction amount excluding ineligible products, refunds and exchange discounts is INR 10,000 for Credit Card EMI transactions.

c) Offer and Maximum Savings as below:

d) The minimum Transaction value needs to be met at a cart level for the customer to be eligible for the respective discount.

e) The Maximum discount of INR 3500 per card during Offer Period. The max discount per card will not exceed INR 3500.

f) Any cancelled order(s) will not be eligible for the offer and the refund amount of such order will be adjusted against the instant discount amount.

2. What is the minimum transaction size for the discount for the duration of the event?

The minimum transaction amount to avail the Instant Discount is INR 10,000 for Credit Card EMI in a single transaction on Amazon.in, net of buybacks, refunds and cancellations.

3. What if I cancel my order?

The Offer is applicable for a successful transaction. If Instant Discount is availed on any purchase, and the transaction is subsequently cancelled, the refund amount of such orders will be post adjusting the instant discount amount availed on the purchase.

4. Would I get the Discount offer even if I make a part payment using my Amazon Pay Balance?

No, instant bank discount is not applicable if part payment is made using Amazon Pay Balance.

5. Can I place multiple orders using OneCard Credit cards and still get the Instant discount?

Yes, you can avail instant discount on multiple orders till you exhaust the respective limits of the Cards. However, please note that each transaction must meet the respective minimum value for you to get the instant discount.

6. Is Discount under this Offer applicable on both Credit and Debit cards?

The discount is available only on Credit Card EMI. Offer is NOT valid on 1) Debit Cards and 2) Net banking and 3) Payment made by Cardholders using the 'Cash on Delivery' payment option.

8. Can I get this offer with No Cost EMI?

The offer is valid on No Cost EMI if the product is eligible for No Cost EMI.

9. I purchased an eligible item but still did not get Instant Discount. Why?

For purchases made using ?Card on delivery? transactions and Net Banking transactions, you will not get the benefit of the instant discount.

Net Banking transactions are NOT included in this Offer.

10. My Amazon.in order includes Amazon.in Gift Card(s); will I be eligible for an Instant Discount under this Offer? Is the Offer applicable on purchase of all products?

No, the discount under this Offer is not applicable on purchase of:

Gift Card(s) (Amazon branded and non-Amazon branded)
All types of Prepaid Recharges (Mobile, DTH, Google Play, Subscriptions, Cable TV, Metro and any other type of prepaid recharge
All types of Bills Payments
Digital Gold purchases and sales
Kindle e-books and Kindle Unlimited Subscription Program
Select Mobile, TV and Electronic products (see product page for offer eligibility)
Amazon Pay balance loading
Amazon Prime subscription
Infant Nutrition and feeding products
All types of insurance, travel and entertainment booking (Insurance, Flight, Bus, Trains and Movies)
Amazon Food orders
Gold, precious jewelry including coins.
Installation Orders (Amazon and Brand)
Some products may not be eligible for the Instant Discount offer. Please check product page for eligibility details.

11. My payment failed while placing the order; will I be eligible for the cash back under this Offer?

If your payment failed while placing an order, Amazon.in gives you an option to revive your payment for such order. If you revise your payment within the offer duration, you will be eligible for the discount. For more information on revise payment,click here

The discount is available only on Credit Card EMI. Offer is NOT valid on 1) Debit Cards and 2) Net banking and 3) Payment made by Cardholders using the 'Cash on Delivery' payment option.

Any cancelled, rejected or returned order(s) will not be eligible for the offer and the refund amount of such order will be adjusted with the instant discount amount.

3. How can I avail this offer?

Just go through the normal purchase shopping process. On the payment page, please select your BOBCARD and check whether the transaction is eligible for EMI or not. The Offer is applicable for a successful purchase. However, if you place another order within the offer period, you shall get instant bank discount subject to offer eligibility.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

1. What is the BOBCARD offer?

Get 7.5% instant discount on BOBCARD EMI payment transactions
Any cancelled, rejected or returned order(s) will not be eligible for the offer and the refund amount of such order will be adjusted with the instant discount amount.
2. What is the maximum discount that I can avail?

The maximum discount possible is up to Rs 3,250. Refer the below table:

Additional flat Rs. 750 off on min purchase value of 34,990 on 6 months and above EMI tenure

Additional flat Rs. 1,000 off on min purchase value of 49,990 on 6 months and above EMI tenure

*Mobile, Appliances, TV, Electronics, Media, Toys, Fashion, Devices, Home Kitchen and Furniture

3. How can I avail this offer?

Just go through the normal purchase shopping process. On the payment page, please select your BOBCARD and check whether the transaction is eligible for EMI or not. If yes, please select the desired tenure (above 6 months) and proceed. Check product page first to confirm if product is eligible for the instant bank discount on 6 months and above EMI.

4. Can I get this offer with Exchange offer?

Yes, the offer is valid on exchange as long as minimum purchase value (after Exchange discount) is spent on Bank Card.

5. Can I avail discount on card payment for cash on delivery order? Are net Banking transactions also included in this Offer?

COD and Net Banking transactions are NOT included in this Offer.

6. Would I get the Bank offer even if I make a part payment using my Amazon Pay Balance?

No, the offer is not available if Amazon Pay Balance is selected.

7. Is the offer applicable on EMI?
Yes, the offer is applicable on Credit Card EMI payment above 6-month EMI tenure.

8. What if I cancel my order?

The Offer is applicable for a successful purchase. If Instant Discount is availed on any purchase, and it is subsequently cancelled, the refund amount of such purchases will be posted adjusting the instant discount amount availed on the purchase. However, if you place another order within the offer period, you shall get instant bank discount subject to offer eligibility.

9. My payment failed while placing the order, will I be eligible for the cashback?

If your payment failed while placing the order, Amazon.in gives you an option to revise your payment. If you revise your payment within the offer duration, you will be eligible for the cashback. For more information on revise payment, click here

Offer: Additional INR 750 Instant Discount on BOBCARD 6 month and above EMI Trxn. Minimum purchase value INR 34990
Terms and Conditions:
Promotion Terms
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

Offer period ? November 1st, 2025 00:00 HRS to November 25th, 2025 23:59 HRS

1. What is the BOBCARD offer?

Get 7.5% instant discount on BOBCARD EMI payment transactions
Any cancelled, rejected or returned order(s) will not be eligible for the offer and the refund amount of such order will be adjusted with the instant discount amount.
2. What is the maximum discount that I can avail?

The maximum discount possible is up to Rs 3,250. Refer the below table:

Category

Min Purchase Value

Max Discount (CCEMI)

Mobiles

Additional flat Rs. 750 off on min purchase value of 34,990 on 6 months and above EMI tenure

Additional flat Rs. 1,000 off on min purchase value of 49,990 on 6 months and above EMI tenure

*Mobile, Appliances, TV, Electronics, Media, Toys, Fashion, Devices, Home Kitchen and Furniture

3. How can I avail this offer?

Just go through the normal purchase shopping process. On the payment page, please select your BOBCARD and check whether the transaction is eligible for EMI or not. If yes, please select the desired tenure (above 6 months) and proceed. Check product page first to confirm if product is eligible for the instant bank discount on 6 months and above EMI.

4. Can I get this offer with Exchange offer?

Yes, the offer is valid on exchange as long as minimum purchase value (after Exchange discount) is spent on Bank Card.

5. Can I avail discount on card payment for cash on delivery order? Are net Banking transactions also included in this Offer?

COD and Net Banking transactions are NOT included in this Offer.

6. Would I get the Bank offer even if I make a part payment using my Amazon Pay Balance?

No, the offer is not available if Amazon Pay Balance is selected.

7. Is the offer applicable on EMI?
Yes, the offer is applicable on Credit Card EMI payment above 6-month EMI tenure.

8. What if I cancel my order?

The Offer is applicable for a successful purchase. If Instant Discount is availed on any purchase, and it is subsequently cancelled, the refund amount of such purchases will be posted adjusting the instant discount amount availed on the purchase. However, if you place another order within the offer period, you shall get instant bank discount subject to offer eligibility.

9. My payment failed while placing the order, will I be eligible for the cashback?

If your payment failed while placing the order, Amazon.in gives you an option to revise your payment. If you revise your payment within the offer duration, you will be eligible for the cashback. For more information on revise payment, click here

Offer period ? November 1st, 2025 00:00 HRS to November 25th, 2025 23:59 HRS

1. What is the BOBCARD offer?

Get 7.5% instant discount on BOBCARD EMI payment transactions
Any cancelled, rejected or returned order(s) will not be eligible for the offer and the refund amount of such order will be adjusted with the instant discount amount.
2. What is the maximum discount that I can avail?

The maximum discount possible is up to Rs 3,250. Refer the below table:

Category

Min Purchase Value

Max Discount (CCEMI)

Mobiles

Rs. 10,000

Rs. 1,000

All other Categories*

Rs. 7,500

Rs. 1500

Additional flat Rs. 750 off on min purchase value of 34,990 on 6 months and above EMI tenure

Additional flat Rs. 1,000 off on min purchase value of 49,990 on 6 months and above EMI tenure

*Mobile, Appliances, TV, Electronics, Media, Toys, Fashion, Devices, Home Kitchen and Furniture

3. How can I avail this offer?

Just go through the normal purchase shopping process. On the payment page, please select your BOBCARD and check whether the transaction is eligible for EMI or not. If yes, please select the desired tenure (above 6 months) and proceed. Check product page first to confirm if product is eligible for the instant bank discount on 6 months and above EMI.

4. Can I get this offer with Exchange offer?

Yes, the offer is valid on exchange as long as minimum purchase value (after Exchange discount) is spent on Bank Card.

5. Can I avail discount on card payment for cash on delivery order? Are net Banking transactions also included in this Offer?

COD and Net Banking transactions are NOT included in this Offer.

6. Would I get the Bank offer even if I make a part payment using my Amazon Pay Balance?

No, the offer is not available if Amazon Pay Balance is selected.

7. Is the offer applicable on EMI?
Yes, the offer is applicable on Credit Card EMI payment above 6-month EMI tenure.

8. What if I cancel my order?

The Offer is applicable for a successful purchase. If Instant Discount is availed on any purchase, and it is subsequently cancelled, the refund amount of such purchases will be posted adjusting the instant discount amount availed on the purchase. However, if you place another order within the offer period, you shall get instant bank discount subject to offer eligibility.

9. My payment failed while placing the order, will I be eligible for the cashback?

If your payment failed while placing the order, Amazon.in gives you an option to revise your payment. If you revise your payment within the offer duration, you will be eligible for the cashback. For more information on revise payment, click here

All residents of India holding Credit Card issued by the BOBCARD Limited (each a "Card") are eligible to avail the Offer (each a "Cardholder").
The Offer is valid from November 1st, 2025 to November 25th, 2025 (collectively "Offer Period"), unless revoked or extended by Amazon (in its sole discretion), without any prior notice and without any liability.
Under this Offer, any Cardholder who, during the Offer Period, makes a transaction of INR 7,500 (Rupees Seven Thousand Five Hundred only) for categories (Appliances, TV, Electronics, Media, Toys, Devices, Home Kitchen and Furniture) and INR 10,000 (Rupees Ten Thousand only) for Mobiles using his/her BOBCARD("Card"), on www.amazon.in or the mobile application/mobile site thereof (collectively, "Amazon.in"), irrespective of the number of transactions (?Offer?), and makes the payment of the purchase transaction (of the Product) using the Card (issued by the Bank), and by availing equated monthly installments (EMI) facility (provided on the Card by the Bank), will be entitled to receive an instant discount of 7.5% of the list price of the Product Cardholders need to check the offer eligibility on the Product Page.

Each Cardholder can avail a maximum discount of INR 3,250 per Card under this Offer, irrespective of number of purchases during the Offer Period.
The Offer is valid on multiple purchase transactions for the products except groceries during the Offer Period, subject to a minimum transaction amount of mentioned in point 5. for all categories for each such transaction made by the Cardholder.
This Offer will also be applicable on purchase of the products except grocery by Cardholders under an exchange offer (if available on the Product(s). For avoidance of doubt, it is hereby clarified that the discount amount of INR 3,250 will be provided to Cardholders under this Offer on the net value paid on such transaction i.e., the price paid by Cardholders after the exchange offer has been availed, provided such value should be a minimum of INR 10,000 for Mobiles and INR 7,500 for all other categories.
This Offer can be availed / clubbed with a no-cost equated monthly installment (EMI) promotion, if any, on the Product. In other words, if no-cost EMI promotion is being availed by the Cardholder on the Product, then the Cardholder will also be eligible for this Offer.
In case there are multiple items in a purchase order, the item-wise savings/discount may vary. However, the overall savings/discount on the purchase order will be equivalent to maximum savings / discount the Cardholder is eligible for under this Offer.
This Offer will not be applicable if the Cardholder or the seller or Amazon cancel the order and/or the Cardholder returns the Product and, in such a case, participation in the Offer will be deemed withdrawn. In such a scenario, only the net amount paid by the Cardholder will be refunded.
Bank and/or Amazon do not endorse any of the products or brands being offered on Amazon.in and will not accept any liability pertaining to the quality, merchantability, fitness, delivery or after sales service of such products.
The Bank reserves the right to disqualify Cardholders from the benefits of the Offer if any fraudulent activity is identified as being carried out for the purpose of availing the benefits under the said Offer or otherwise by use of the Card.
Amazon reserves the right, at any time, without prior notice and without assigning any reason whatsoever, to add/alter/modify/change or vary any or all of these Offer Terms or to replace, wholly or in part, this Offer by another offer, whether similar to this Offer or not.
Delinquent and over-limit Bank's credit card members will not qualify for this Offer.
Cardholders are not bound in any way to participate in this Offer. Any such participation is purely voluntary. The Offer is being made purely on a best effort basis.
Nothing herein amounts to a commitment by the Bank or Amazon to conduct further, similar or other offers.
The above Offer is by way of a special offer and nothing contained herein shall prejudice or affect the terms and conditions of the card member agreement. The terms of the above schemes shall be in addition to and not in derogation of the terms contained in the card member agreement.
All disputes between Cardholders and Bank will be resolved inter se, and Amazon will not (nor will be liable or obliged to) mediate or resolve any dispute or disagreement between Cardholders and Bank.
This Offer is not valid on corporate, commercial Cards issued by the Bank.
This Offer is not available on: (i) purchase of product(s) other than the Product(s), or (ii) purchase of Product using an instrument other than the one mentioned in point 5.
Under no circumstance will benefit being offered under this Offer be settled with cash in lieu by Bank or by Amazon.
By participating in this Offer, every Cardholder expressly agrees that Amazon or any of its affiliates will not be liable or responsible for any loss or damage whatsoever that a Cardholder may suffer, directly or indirectly, in connection with this Offer including but not limited to that associated with his/ her use or delivery or misuse of the Product.
These Offer Terms are governed by the laws of India and the courts at New Delhi will have exclusive jurisdiction over any disputes in relation to these Offer Terms.
Any person availing this Offer will be deemed to have accepted these Offer Terms.
Notwithstanding anything contained in these Offer Terms, this Offer is not applicable on the purchase of the following products;
Gift Card(s) (Amazon branded and Non Amazon branded).
Prepaid phone recharges, DTH recharges, Bill Payments.
Kindle e-books and Kindle Unlimited Subscription Program.
Amazon Pay balance loading.
Amazon Prime subscription.
Infant Nutrition products.
Select Smart phones (see product page for offer eligibility).
Godrej Interio products.
Precious jewelry including Gold/Silver Coins.
Some products might not be eligible for the offer. Please check the product detail page for offer eligibility.
How to avail offer
Select eligible card at the time of checkout
No promo code required to avail the offer

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

1. What is the BOBCARD offer?

Get 7.5% instant discount on BOBCARD EMI payment transactions
Any cancelled, rejected or returned order(s) will not be eligible for the offer and the refund amount of such order will be adjusted with the instant discount amount.
2. What is the maximum discount that I can avail?

The maximum discount possible is up to Rs 3,250. Refer the below table:

Additional flat Rs. 1,000 off on min purchase value of 49,990 on 6 months and above EMI tenure

*Mobile, Appliances, TV, Electronics, Media, Toys, Fashion, Devices, Home Kitchen and Furniture

3. How can I avail this offer?

Just go through the normal purchase shopping process. On the payment page, please select your BOBCARD and check whether the transaction is eligible for EMI or not. If yes, please select the desired tenure (above 6 months) and proceed. Check product page first to confirm if product is eligible for the instant bank discount on 6 months and above EMI.

4. Can I get this offer with Exchange offer?

Yes, the offer is valid on exchange as long as minimum purchase value (after Exchange discount) is spent on Bank Card.

5. Can I avail discount on card payment for cash on delivery order? Are net Banking transactions also included in this Offer?

COD and Net Banking transactions are NOT included in this Offer.

6. Would I get the Bank offer even if I make a part payment using my Amazon Pay Balance?

No, the offer is not available if Amazon Pay Balance is selected.

7. Is the offer applicable on EMI?
Yes, the offer is applicable on Credit Card EMI payment above 6-month EMI tenure.

8. What if I cancel my order?

The Offer is applicable for a successful purchase. If Instant Discount is availed on any purchase, and it is subsequently cancelled, the refund amount of such purchases will be posted adjusting the instant discount amount availed on the purchase. However, if you place another order within the offer period, you shall get instant bank discount subject to offer eligibility.

9. My payment failed while placing the order, will I be eligible for the cashback?

If your payment failed while placing the order, Amazon.in gives you an option to revise your payment. If you revise your payment within the offer duration, you will be eligible for the cashback. For more information on revise payment, click here

3. How can I avail this offer?

3. How can I avail this offer?

Just go through the normal purchase shopping process. On the payment page, please select your BOBCARD and check whether the transaction is eligible for EMI or not. If yes, please select the desired tenure (above 6 months) and proceed. Check product page first to confirm if product is eligible for the instant bank discount on 6 months and above EMI.

4. Can I get this offer with Exchange offer?

Yes, the offer is valid on exchange as long as minimum purchase value (after Exchange discount) is spent on Bank Card.

5. Can I avail discount on card payment for cash on delivery order? Are net Banking transactions also included in this Offer?

COD and Net Banking transactions are NOT included in this Offer.

6. Would I get the Bank offer even if I make a part payment using my Amazon Pay Balance?

No, the offer is not available if Amazon Pay Balance is selected.

7. Is the offer applicable on EMI?
Yes, the offer is applicable on Credit Card EMI payment above 6-month EMI tenure.

8. What if I cancel my order?

The Offer is applicable for a successful purchase. If Instant Discount is availed on any purchase, and it is subsequently cancelled, the refund amount of such purchases will be posted adjusting the instant discount amount availed on the purchase. However, if you place another order within the offer period, you shall get instant bank discount subject to offer eligibility.

1. What is the BOBCARD offer?

Get 7.5% instant discount on BOBCARD EMI payment transactions
Any cancelled, rejected or returned order(s) will not be eligible for the offer and the refund amount of such order will be adjusted with the instant discount amount.
2. What is the maximum discount that I can avail?

The maximum discount possible is up to Rs 3,250. Refer the below table:

3. How can I avail this offer?

Just go through the normal purchase shopping process. On the payment page, please select your BOBCARD and check whether the transaction is eligible for EMI or not. If yes, please select the desired tenure (above 6 months) and proceed. Check product page first to confirm if product is eligible for the instant bank discount on 6 months and above EMI.

4. Can I get this offer with Exchange offer?

Yes, the offer is valid on exchange as long as minimum purchase value (after Exchange discount) is spent on Bank Card.

5. Can I avail discount on card payment for cash on delivery order? Are net Banking transactions also included in this Offer?

COD and Net Banking transactions are NOT included in this Offer.

6. Would I get the Bank offer even if I make a part payment using my Amazon Pay Balance?

No, the offer is not available if Amazon Pay Balance is selected.

7. Is the offer applicable on EMI?
Yes, the offer is applicable on Credit Card EMI payment above 6-month EMI tenure.

8. What if I cancel my order?

The Offer is applicable for a successful purchase. If Instant Discount is availed on any purchase, and it is subsequently cancelled, the refund amount of such purchases will be posted adjusting the instant discount amount availed on the purchase. However, if you place another order within the offer period, you shall get instant bank discount subject to offer eligibility.

9. My payment failed while placing the order, will I be eligible for the cashback?

If your payment failed while placing the order, Amazon.in gives you an option to revise your payment. If you revise your payment within the offer duration, you will be eligible for the cashback. For more information on revise payment, click here

No, the offer is not applicable EMI payment.

Offer: 10% Instant Discount up to INR 1500 on J and K Mastercard Non-EMI Trnxs. Minimum purchase value INR 3000
Terms and Conditions:
Promotion Terms
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

1. What is the J&K Bank Mastercard Credit Card and Debit Card Offer?

Get 10% instant discount on J&K Credit and Debit Card transactions in the months of October & November from 21st October ? 20th November 2025.
Any cancelled, rejected or returned order(s) will not be eligible for the offer and the refund amount of such order will be adjusted with the instant discount amount.
Please check Product Page to confirm the offer eligibility.
 
2. What is the maximum discount that I can avail?

The maximum discount possible up to INR 1,500 on Credit and Debit Card transactions per Card per Month. Refer the below table:

Categories

Min Transaction

Maximum Discount on Credit Card and Debit Card

Mobiles

INR 5,000

INR 1,000

Fashion & Book

INR 1,500

INR 1,500

All Other categories*

INR 3,000

INR 1,500

* Large Appliances, TV, Home Kitchen, Furniture and Electronics

3. How can I avail this offer?

There are no other special steps to avail this offer. Just go through the normal purchase process and use your saved J&K Debit or Credit Card to pay

4. Can I get this offer with Exchange offer?

Yes, the offer is valid on exchange as long as minimum purchase value (after Exchange discount) is spent on Bank Card.

5. Can I avail discount on card payment for cash on delivery order? Are net Banking transactions also included in this Offer?

COD and Net Banking transactions are NOT included in this Offer.

6. Would I get the Bank offer even if I make a part payment using my Amazon Pay Balance?

No, the offer is not available if Amazon Pay Balance is selected.

7. Is the offer applicable on EMI?
No, this offer is not applicable on EMI payment.

8. What if I cancel my order?

The Offer is applicable for a successful purchase. If Instant Discount is availed on any purchase, and it is subsequently cancelled, the refund amount of such purchases will be posted adjusting the instant discount amount availed on the purchase. However, if you place another order within the offer period, you shall get instant bank discount subject to offer eligibility.

9. My payment failed while placing the order, will I be eligible for the cashback?

If your payment failed while placing the order, Amazon.in gives you an option to revise your payment. If you revise your payment within the offer duration, you will be eligible for the cashback. For more information on revise payment, click here

Yes, the offer is valid on exchange as long as minimum purchase value (after Exchange discount) is spent on Bank Card.

5. Can I avail discount on card payment for cash on delivery order? Are net Banking transactions also included in this Offer?

COD and Net Banking transactions are NOT included in this Offer.

6. Would I get the Bank offer even if I make a part payment using my Amazon Pay Balance?

No, the offer is not available if Amazon Pay Balance is selected.

7. Is the offer applicable on EMI?
Yes, the offer is applicable on Credit Card EMI payment above 6-month EMI tenure.

8. What if I cancel my order?

The Offer is applicable for a successful purchase. If Instant Discount is availed on any purchase, and it is subsequently cancelled, the refund amount of such purchases will be posted adjusting the instant discount amount availed on the purchase. However, if you place another order within the offer period, you shall get instant bank discount subject to offer eligibility.

9. My payment failed while placing the order, will I be eligible for the cashback?

If your payment failed while placing the order, Amazon.in gives you an option to revise your payment. If you revise your payment within the offer duration, you will be eligible for the cashback. For more information on revise payment, click here

The Offer is applicable for a successful purchase. However, if you place another order within the offer period, you shall get instant bank discount subject to offer eligibility.

Any cancelled, rejected or returned order(s) will not be eligible for the offer and the refund amount of such order will be adjusted with the instant discount amount.

3. How can I avail this offer?

Just go through the normal purchase shopping process. On the payment page, please select your BOBCARD and check whether the transaction is eligible for EMI or not. If yes, please select the desired tenure (above 6 months) and proceed. Check product page first to confirm if product is eligible for the instant bank discount on 6 months and above EMI.

The Offer is applicable for a successful purchase. If Instant Discount is availed on any purchase, and it is subsequently cancelled, the refund amount of such purchases will be posted adjusting the instant discount amount availed on the purchase. However, if you place another order within the offer period, you shall get instant bank discount subject to offer eligibility.

Offer period ? 1st November 00:00 HRS to 15th November 2025 23:59 HRS

What is the Canara Bank Card Offer?
Get 10% instant discount on Canara Bank Credit Card Non-EMI payment transactions
Any cancelled, rejected or returned order(s) will not be eligible for the offer and the refund amount of such order will be adjusted with the instant discount amount.
2. What is the maximum discount that I can avail?

The maximum discount possible is up to INR 1,500. Refer to the table below:

Categories

Minimum order value

Maximum Discount

Credit Card Non-EMI Trxns

Select Categories*

Rs 5,000

Rs 1,000

Additional Flat Rs 500 Instant Discount on Credit Card on single transaction worth Rs 24,990

*Mobiles, Appliances, TV, Electronics, Media, Home Kitchen and Furniture.

3. How can I avail this offer?

There are no other special steps to avail of this offer. Just go through the normal purchase process and use your saved Canara Bank Credit Card to pay

4. Can I get this offer with Exchange offer?

Yes, the offer is valid on exchange as long as minimum purchase value (after Exchange discount) is spent on Bank Card.

5. Can I avail discount on card payment for cash on delivery order? Are net Banking transactions also included in this Offer?

COD and Net Banking transactions are NOT included in this Offer.

6. Would I get the Bank offer even if I make a part payment using my Amazon Pay Balance?

No, the offer is not available if Amazon Pay Balance is selected.

7. Is the offer applicable on EMI?
No, the offer is not applicable EMI payment.

8. What if I cancel my order?

The Offer is applicable for successful purchase. If Instant Discount is availed on any purchase, and it is subsequently cancelled, the refund amount of such purchases will be posted adjusting the instant discount amount availed on the purchase. However, if you place another order within the offer period, you shall get instant bank discount subject to offer eligibility.

9. My payment failed while placing the order, will I be eligible for the cashback?

If your payment failed while placing the order, Amazon.in gives you an option to revise your payment. If you revise your payment within the offer duration, you will be eligible for the cashback. For more information on revise payment, click here

Schedule 1

Offer Terms and Conditions

This "Offer" is provided to the Cardholders by Canara Bank ("Bank") and Amazon Pay (India) Private Limited (formerly known as Amazon Online Distribution Services Private Limited) ("Amazon") and made available on the website www.amazon.in and the mobile site and mobile application thereof (collectively, "Amazon.in").
These Offer terms and conditions ("Offer Terms") are in addition to the Amazon.in Conditions of Use & Sale and Privacy Notice to which your Cardholder agrees to by using Amazon.in. In the event of any conflict between the Conditions of Use & Sale and these Offer Terms, these Offer Terms will prevail, only for the purposes of this Offer.
All residents of India holding a valid Credit card issued by the Bank (each a "Card") are eligible to avail the Offer (each a "Cardholder").
The offer is valid in the month of November 2025 i.e., 1st November 00:00 HRS to 15th November 2025 23:59 HRS ("Offer Period"), unless revoked or extended by Amazon in its sole discretion, without any prior notice and without liability.
Under this Offer, any Cardholder who, during the Offer Duration, makes any purchase of Products from Amazon.in and makes the payment using the Card, will be entitled to receive an instant discount of 10% of the total purchase value for a successful purchase transaction made on Amazon.in, provided the purchase value for such transaction (inclusive of taxes) is equivalent to or exceeds INR 5,000 on all categories per transaction.
Each Cardholder can avail a maximum instant discount of Rs.1,500 per card.

*Mobiles, Appliances, TV, Electronics, Media, Home Kitchen and Furniture.

The purchase of the product(s) will be governed by the terms of sale, including terms of exchange (wherever available), applicable to the sale of the product(s) on Amazon.in. This Offer will also be applicable on purchase of product(s) by the Cardholders under an exchange offer.
The Instant Discount would not be applicable on payment made by Cardholders using the 'Cash on Delivery' payment option.
In case there are multiple items in a purchase order, the item-wise savings/discount may vary. However, the overall savings/discount on the purchase order will be equivalent to maximum savings / discount the Cardholder is eligible for under this Offer.
The Offer is not applicable on Debit Card and Credit card EMI transactions.
In the event the order is returned or cancelled by the Cardholder, seller or Amazon Seller Services Private Limited, for any reason whatsoever, and subsequently the order / purchase transaction value falls below INR 5000 per transaction the order will not qualify for this Offer and the participation of the Cardholder will be deemed withdrawn.
If Instant Discount is availed on any purchase, and the transaction is subsequently cancelled, the refund amount of such orders will be post adjusting the instant discount amount availed on the purchase.
Amazon reserves the right, at any time, without prior notice, without liability, and without assigning any reason whatsoever, to add/alter/modify/change or vary all of these Offer Terms or to replace, wholly or in part, this Offer by another offer, whether similar to this Offer or not.
Nothing contained herein amounts to a commitment by Amazon or the Bank to conduct further, similar or other offers.
The above Offer is by way of a special offer, and nothing contained herein shall prejudice or affect the terms and conditions of the card member agreement (if any is executed by the Bank). The terms of the above schemes shall be in addition to and not in derogation of the terms contained in the card member agreement.
Delinquent and over-limit Bank's credit Card members will not qualify for this Offer.
This Offer is not valid on corporate or commercial cards issued by the Bank.
All disputes between the Cardholders and the Bank will be resolved inter se and Amazon will not (nor will be liable or obliged to) mediate or resolve any dispute or disagreement between the Cardholders and the Bank unless there is any service deficiency on the part of Amazon. In such case Amazon shall be liable for the same
This Offer cannot be availed on: (i) purchase of the ineligible / excluding products mentioned above; or (ii) purchase by Cardholder using any card other than the Card (mentioned above).
Under no circumstances will the cashback being offered under this Offer be settled in cash in lieu thereof by Amazon.
By participating in this Offer, every Cardholder expressly agrees that Amazon or any of its affiliates will not be liable or responsible for any loss or damage whatsoever that a Cardholder may suffer, directly or indirectly, in connection with this Offer, including but not limited to that associated with his/her use or delivery or misuse of any product purchased on Amazon.in unless there is any service deficiency on the part of Amazon.
These Offer Terms are governed by the laws of India and the courts at New Delhi will have exclusive jurisdiction over any matters/disputes arising out of or in relation to these Offer Terms.
The Cardholders are not bound in any way to participate in this Offer. Any participation is voluntary, and the Offer is being made purely on the best effort basis.
Any person availing this Offer shall be deemed to have accepted these Offer Terms.
Notwithstanding anything contained in these Offer Terms, this Offer is not applicable on the purchase of the following products:

5. Can I avail discount on card payment for cash on delivery order? Are net Banking transactions also included in this Offer?

COD and Net Banking transactions are NOT included in this Offer.

6. Would I get the Bank offer even if I make a part payment using my Amazon Pay Balance?

No, the offer is not available if Amazon Pay Balance is selected.

7. Is the offer applicable on EMI?
Yes, the offer is applicable on Credit Card EMI payment above 6-month EMI tenure.

8. What if I cancel my order?

The Offer is applicable for a successful purchase. If Instant Discount is availed on any purchase, and it is subsequently cancelled, the refund amount of such purchases will be posted adjusting the instant discount amount availed on the purchase. However, if you place another order within the offer period, you shall get instant bank discount subject to offer eligibility.

9. My payment failed while placing the order, will I be eligible for the cashback?

If your payment failed while placing the order, Amazon.in gives you an option to revise your payment. If you revise your payment within the offer duration, you will be eligible for the cashback. For more information on revise payment, click here

The Offer is applicable for a successful purchase. Under this Offer, any Cardholder who, during the Offer Period, makes a transaction of INR 7,500 (Rupees Seven Thousand Five Hundred only) for categories (Appliances, TV, Electronics, Media, Toys, Devices, Home Kitchen and Furniture) and INR 10,000 (Rupees Ten Thousand only) for Mobiles using his/her BOBCARD("Card"), on www.amazon.in or the mobile application/mobile site thereof (collectively, "Amazon.in"), irrespective of the number of transactions (?Offer?), and makes the payment of the purchase transaction (of the Product) using the Card (issued by the Bank), and by availing equated monthly installments (EMI) facility (provided on the Card by the Bank), will be entitled to receive an instant discount of 7.5% of the list price of the Product Cardholders need to check the offer eligibility on the Product Page.

This Offer will also be applicable on purchase of the products except grocery by Cardholders under an exchange offer (if available on the Product(s). For avoidance of doubt, it is hereby clarified that the discount amount of INR 3,250 will be provided to Cardholders under this Offer on the net value paid on such transaction i.e., the price paid by Cardholders after the exchange offer has been availed, provided such value should be a minimum of INR 10,000 for Mobiles and INR 7,500 for all other categories.
This Offer can be availed / clubbed with a no-cost equated monthly installment (EMI) promotion, if any, on the Product. In other words, if no-cost EMI promotion is being availed by the Cardholder on the Product, then the Cardholder will also be eligible for this Offer.
In case there are multiple items in a purchase order, the item-wise savings/discount may vary. However, the overall savings/discount on the purchase order will be equivalent to maximum savings / discount the Cardholder is eligible for under this Offer.

Offer: 7.5% Instant Discount up to INR 1500 on BOBCARD EMI Trxn. Minimum purchase value INR 7500
Terms and Conditions:
Promotion Terms
Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

Offer period ? November 1st, 2025 00:00 HRS to November 25th, 2025 23:59 HRS

1. What is the BOBCARD offer?

Get 7.5% instant discount on BOBCARD EMI payment transactions
Any cancelled, rejected or returned order(s) will not be eligible for the offer and the refund amount of such order will be adjusted with the instant discount amount.
2. What is the maximum discount that I can avail?

The maximum discount possible is up to Rs 3,250. Refer the below table:

Category

Min Purchase Value

Max Discount (CCEMI)

Mobiles

Rs. 10,000

Rs. 1,000

All other Categories*

Rs. 7,500

Rs. 1500

Additional flat Rs. 750 off on min purchase value of 34,990 on 6 months and above EMI tenure

Additional flat Rs. 1,000 off on min purchase value of 49,990 on 6 months and above EMI tenure

*Mobile, Appliances, TV, Electronics, Media, Toys, Fashion, Devices, Home Kitchen and Furniture

3. How can I avail this offer?

Just go through the normal purchase shopping process. On the payment page, please select your BOBCARD and check whether the transaction is eligible for EMI or not. If yes, please select the desired tenure (above 6 months) and proceed. Check product page first to confirm if product is eligible for the instant bank discount on 6 months and above EMI.

4. Can I get this offer with Exchange offer?

Yes, the offer is valid on exchange as long as minimum purchase value (after Exchange discount) is spent on Bank Card.

5. Can I avail discount on card payment for cash on delivery order? Are net Banking transactions also included in this Offer?

COD and Net Banking transactions are NOT included in this Offer.

6. Would I get the Bank offer even if I make a part payment using my Amazon Pay Balance?

No, the offer is not available if Amazon Pay Balance is selected.

7. Is the offer applicable on EMI?
Yes, the offer is applicable on Credit Card EMI payment above 6-month EMI tenure.

8. What if I cancel my order?

The Offer is applicable for a successful purchase. If Instant Discount is availed on any purchase, and it is subsequently cancelled, the refund amount of such purchases will be posted adjusting the instant discount amount availed on the purchase. However, if you place another order within the offer period, you shall get instant bank discount subject to offer eligibility.

9. My payment failed while placing the order, will I be eligible for the cashback?

If your payment failed while placing the order, Amazon.in gives you an option to revise your payment. If you revise your payment within the offer duration, you will be eligible for the cashback. For more information on revise payment, click here

This offer ("Offer") is provided by Yes Bank Limited ("Bank") facilitated by Amazon Pay (India) Private Limited, and made available on www.amazon.in, the mobile application and mobile site thereof (collectively "Amazon.in") by Amazon Seller Services Private Limited. (Amazon Pay (India) Private Limited and Amazon Seller Services Private Limited collectively referred to as "Amazon").
These Offer terms and conditions ("Offer Terms") are in addition to Amazon.in Conditions of Use & Sale and Privacy Notice to which you agree to by using Amazon.in. In the event of any conflict between the Conditions of Use & Sale and these Offer Terms, these Offer Terms will prevail, only for the purposes of this Offer.
All residents of India holding a valid and current credit card issued by the Bank ("Card") are eligible to avail the Offer ("Cardholder").
This Offer is valid in the month of November 2025 i.e., November 1st 00:00 Hrs to November 30th 23:59 Hrs 2025 ("Offer Period"), or until stocks of the Products (defined below) made available by the sellers on Amazon.in last, whichever is earlier, unless revoked or extended by Amazon (in its sole discretion) or revoked by the Bank, without any prior notice and without liability.
Under this Offer, any Cardholder who, during the Offer Period, purchases any products (Mobiles, Large Appliances, TV, Electronics, Media and Home, Kitchen and Furniture) listed under the offer and makes a transaction of INR 5,000 or above using his/her Yes Bank Credit Card(?Card?), on www.amazon.in or the mobile application/ mobile site thereof (collectively, "Amazon.in"), irrespective of the number of transactions (?Offer?), and makes the payment of the purchase transaction (of the Product) using the Card(issued by the Bank), and by availing the equated monthly installments (EMI) facility, will be entitled to receive 7.5% up-to INR 2750 instant discount. Cardholders need to check the offer eligibility on the Product Page.

Each Cardholder can avail a maximum discount of INR 2,750 per Card under this Offer, irrespective of number of purchases during the Offer Period.
The Offer is valid on multiple purchase transactions for the Products during the Offer Period, subject to a minimum transaction amount of INR 5,000 for each such transaction made by the Cardholder.
This Offer will also be applicable on purchase of Products by Cardholders under an exchange offer (if available on the Product(s). For the avoidance of doubt, it is hereby clarified that the discount amount of 7.5% up-to INR 2,750 instant discount will be provided to Cardholders under this Offer on the net value paid on such transaction i.e., the price paid by Cardholders after the exchange offer has been availed, provided such value should be a minimum of INR 5,000.
This Offer can be availed / clubbed with a no-cost equated monthly installment (EMI) promotion, if any, on the Product. In other words, if no-cost EMI promotion is being availed by the Cardholder on the Product, then the Cardholder will also be eligible for this Offer.
In case there are multiple items in a purchase order, the item-wise savings/discount may vary. However, the overall savings/discount on the purchase order will be equivalent to maximum savings / discount the Cardholder is eligible for under this Offer.
This Offer will not be applicable if the Cardholder or the seller or Amazon cancel the order and/or the Cardholder returns the Product and, in such a case, participation in the Offer will be deemed withdrawn. In such a scenario, only the net amount paid by the Cardholder will be refunded.

Amazon reserves the right, at any time, without prior notice and without assigning any reason whatsoever, to add/alter/modify/change or vary any or all of these Offer Terms or to replace, wholly or in part, this Offer by another offer, whether similar to this Offer or not.
Delinquent and over-limit Bank's credit card members will not qualify for this Offer.
Cardholders are not bound in any way to participate in this Offer. Any such participation is purely voluntary. The Offer is being made purely on a best effort basis.
Nothing herein amounts to a commitment by the Bank or Amazon to conduct further, similar or other offers.
The above Offer is by way of a special offer and nothing contained herein shall prejudice or affect the terms and conditions of the card member agreement. The terms of the above schemes shall be in addition to and not in derogation of the terms contained in the card member agreement.
All disputes between Cardholders and Bank will be resolved inter se, and Amazon will not (nor will be liable or obliged to) mediate or resolve any dispute or disagreement between Cardholders and Bank.
This Offer is not valid on corporate, commercial Cards issued by the Bank.
This Offer is not available on: (i) purchase of product(s) other than the Product(s), or (ii) purchase of Product using an instrument other than the one mentioned in point 5.
Under no circumstance will benefit being offered under this Offer be settled with cash in lieu by Bank or by Amazon.
By participating in this Offer, every Cardholder expressly agrees that Amazon or any of its affiliates will not be liable or responsible for any loss or damage whatsoever that a Cardholder may suffer, directly or indirectly, in connection with this Offer including but not limited to that associated with his/ her use or delivery or misuse of the Product.
These Offer Terms are governed by the laws of India and the courts at New Delhi will have exclusive jurisdiction over any disputes in relation to these Offer Terms.
Any person availing this Offer will be deemed to have accepted these Offer Terms.
Notwithstanding anything contained in these Offer Terms, this Offer is not applicable on the purchase of the following products:
Gift Card(s) (Amazon branded and Non Amazon branded)
Prepaid phone recharges, DTH recharges, Bill Payments
Kindle e-books and Kindle Unlimited Subscription Program
Amazon Pay balance loading
Amazon Prime subscription

Precious Jewellery including Gold/Silver Coins.
Grocery Products

Offer: 7.5% Instant Discount up to INR 1500 on Yes Bank Credit Card EMI Trxn. Minimum purchase value INR 5000
Terms and Conditions:
Promotion Terms
FAQs

1.What is the offer?

Get 7.5% instant bank discount on Yes Bank Credit Card EMI on purchase of select products from November 1st 00:00 Hrs to November 30th 23:59 Hrs 2025. Please check Product Page to confirm the offer eligibility.

2.How can I avail this offer?

Just go through the normal purchase shopping process. On the payment page, please select your saved Yes Bank Credit Card and check whether the transaction is eligible for EMI or not. If yes, please select the desired sure and proceed. Check product page first to confirm if product is eligible for the instant bank discount on EMI.

3.What is the minimum transaction size for the instant discount?

The minimum transaction amount to avail discount is Rs. 5,000.

Categories

Min Transaction

Maximum Discount on Credit Card EMI

Mobiles

INR 5,000

INR 1,000

All categories*

INR 5,000

INR 1,500

Additional Flat Rs 500 Instant Discount on Credit Card EMI on single transaction worth Rs 24,999

Additional Flat Rs 750 Instant Discount on Credit Card EMI on single transaction worth Rs 34,999

* Appliances, TV, Electronics, Media, Fashion, Home Kitchen and Furniture

4.What is the maximum discount that I can avail?

The maximum discount of INR 2,750 per Card under this Offer.

5.What if I cancel/return the product?

Offer is not applicable if the order is cancelled, or product is returned.

6.Can I avail discount on card payment for cash on delivery order? Are net Banking transactions also included in this Offer?

Net Banking and Card Payment on COD transactions are NOT included in this Offer.

7.Can I get this offer even with Exchange?

Yes, you can avail this offer even if the transaction involves exchange of an old product but the transaction value after exchange should be greater than Rs. 5000.

8. Would I get the Discount offer even if I make a part payment using my Amazon Pay Balance?

No, instant bank discount is not applicable if part payment is made using Amazon Pay Balance.

9.My payment failed while placing the order, will I be eligible for the discount?

If your payment failed while placing the order, Amazon.in gives you an option to revise your payment. If you revise your payment within the offer duration, you will be eligible for the cashback. For more information on revise payment, click here
